instruction_text_private:
Use the buttons in the menu to navigate.

The /getcrypto command allows you to get the rate and chart with a single command.

instruction_text_group:
To find out the rate, use the /getcrypto command.
Format: `/getcrypto <language> <fiat> <crypto> <period>`
Example: `/getcrypto en_us usd btc 24h`

Languages: ru_ru, en_us
Fiats: rub, usd, both
Cryptos: btc, eth, usdt, sol
Periods: 24h, 7d, 30d
